model.genetic

Class GeneticAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.genetic.GeneticAlgorithm

  • public class GeneticAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a genetic algorithm to robocode to find the parameters of a perceptron.
    Version:
    1.0 - 17/11/15
    Author:
    BOIZUMAULT Romain, BUSSENEAU Alexis, GEFFRAULT Luc, MATHIEU Vianney, VAILLAND Guillaume

      The battle configuration for test the individuals.

      The probability to make a crossover.

      The name of an xml file.

      The number of maximum mutation when it happens.
      private static int MUTATION_MIN
      The number of minimum mutation when it happens.
      private static double MUTATION_PROBABILITY
      The probability to make a mutation.
      private static int NB_THREADS
      Take only the third quarter of the available cores of the computer user.

      The individuals of the generation.

      The directory where the population will be saved.

      The size of the population.

      The directory containing the Robocode library.

      The directory where the Darwini's perceptron is loaded.

      The population's scores.
      private static int TOURNAMENT_SIZE
      The range size of a tournament for a selection.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GeneticAlgorithm()
      Initialize the genetic algorithm loading all the available individuals (perceptron) or creating it if it doesn't exist.

      • POPULATION_DIRECTORY

        private static final java.lang.String POPULATION_DIRECTORY

        The directory where the population will be saved.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ROBOT_DIRECTORY

        private static final java.lang.String ROBOT_DIRECTORY

        The directory where the Darwini's perceptron is loaded. This directory can change if you use Eclipse or IntelliJ. Currently, it is set to IntelliJ configuration.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INDIVIDUAL_FILENAME

        private static final java.lang.String INDIVIDUAL_FILENAME

        The name of an xml file.

        The directory containing the Robocode library.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BATTLE_PATH

        private static final java.lang.String BATTLE_PATH

        The battle configuration for test the individuals. Modify it if you want to change the opponent robot.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RESULTS_PATH

        private static final java.lang.String RESULTS_PATH

        The path where the temporary file created by Robocode will be saved.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NB_THREADS

        private static final int NB_THREADS

        Take only the third quarter of the available cores of the computer user.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeneticAlgorithm

        public GeneticAlgorithm()

        Initialize the genetic algorithm loading all the available individuals (perceptron) or creating it if it doesn't exist. During the initialization, each perceptron is tested and scored.

    • Method Detail

      • keepBest

        private int keepBest()

        Return the best individual among the current population.

        Returns:
        the index of best individual

      • selection

        private NeuralNetwork selection()

        Select by tournament an individual.

        Returns:
        the individual selected

      • crossover

        private NeuralNetwork[] crossover(NeuralNetwork mother,
                                  NeuralNetwork father)

        Cross two individuals and return their descendants.

        Parameters:
        mother - the first individual to cross
        father - the second individual to cross
        Returns:
        the children generated

      • cross

        private void cross(Matrix m1,
                   Matrix m2)

        Make a double crossing over on two matrices.

        Parameters:
        m1 - the first matrix to cross
        m2 - the fsecond matrix to cross

      • mutation

        private void mutation(NeuralNetwork child)

        Make a mutation on an individual.

        Parameters:
        child - the individual to mutate

      • mutate

        private void mutate(Matrix m)

        Realize a mutation on a matrix

        Parameters:
        m - the matrix to mutate

      • fitness

        private Score fitness(int individual)

        Evaluate an individual with Robocode. This method is synchronized because only one individual can be tested at a time.

        Parameters:
        individual - the index of the individual to test
        Returns:
        the score of the individual

      • generate

        public void generate(int numberGeneration)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Launch the generations.

        Parameters:
        numberGeneration - the number of generation to do
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the number of generation specified is less than 1

      • random

        private int random(int min,
                   int max)

        Return a random number between the min and the max.

        Parameters:
        min - the minimum value
        max - the maximum value
        Returns:
        the random number

      • copyFile

        private void copyFile(java.lang.String inputFile,
                      java.lang.String outputFile)
               throws java.io.IOException

        Copy a file from a path to another path.

        Parameters:
        inputFile - the source file
        outputFile - the destination file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file paths do not exist

      • savePopulation

        public void savePopulation()

        Copy all the generation in XML format to allow user to reuse this generation for the genetic algorithm.

      • whoIsTheBest

        public int whoIsTheBest(boolean copy)

        Return the best individual of the population.

        Parameters:
        copy - if true, copy the best individual into the Darwini's perceptron
        Returns:
        the index of the best individual
